question: What is the approximate gap between solar year and lunar year, which results into Adhik Mas in Hindu Calender after certain years?
explanation: There is a gap of 11 days, 1 hour, 31 minutes and 12 seconds(approx 11 days) between solar year and lunar year because the solar year is of 365 days and about 6 hours and the lunar year is of 354 days which results into Adhik Mas in Hindu Calender after 32 months.
